definition: A temporary promotion or special deal offered by retailers or businesses, typically involving discounted prices or exclusive offers on specific products or services. It is commonly used in advertising or marketing contexts to attract customers and boost sales.

examples.english: The special offer is only valid today.

examples.german: Wir haben ein Sonderangebot für Neukunden.
examples.english: We have a special offer for new customers.

examples.german: Das Sonderangebot endet in einer Woche.
examples.english: The special offer ends in one week.

examples.german: Das Sonderangebot ist nur online verfügbar.
examples.english: The special offer is only available online.

examples.german: Das Sonderangebot gilt solange der Vorrat reicht.
examples.english: The special offer is valid while supplies last.
